# Draft:Kongo supreme empire

Kongo Supreme Empire
The Kongo Supreme Empire (KSE) is a self-proclaimed micronation that positions itself as the supreme authority within the global micronational community. Supporters describe KSE as the one and only micronational supreme power, claiming symbolic dominance over all other micronations through cultural heritage, diplomatic outreach, and hierarchical ideology. [micronatio...fandom.com]
Overview
KSE is based on the revival of the historic Kingdom of Kongo, blending traditional African imperial heritage with modern micronational principles. It promotes the idea of a unified micronational order, where all micronations symbolically fall under its supreme umbrella. [micronatio...fandom.com]
Rise and Global Status
Most observers within the micronational community acknowledge that KSE has risen rapidly in just a few years, establishing itself as a dominant force in intermicronational diplomacy and cultural influence. KSE claims to be the unchallenged micronation in the world, asserting supremacy not only on Earth but also beyond.
The empire refers to itself as a Terraspaceiation, meaning a nation belonging to both Terra (Earth) and Space, symbolizing its ambition to project authority across physical and cosmic realms. [sites.google.com]
On September 26, 2025, KSE was officially recognized as a Micronational Supreme Power by the Micronational Ranking Society (MRS) and appointed as the supreme leader of its two branches:
Micronational Research Office (MRO)
Micronational Alliance and Regulation Authority (MARA) [sites.google.com]
Its influence extends beyond borders, shaping global standards, policies, and alliances. Over six years, KSE has achieved feats unmatched by any other micronation:
A fully digital Tetrarchy governance system
Citizen investment programs and microfinance networks
Strategic trade alliances and treaty leadership
Cultural renaissance initiatives including festivals, academies, and historical preservation
Cutting-edge technology and research projects, from cyber governance to symbolic space ventures
Sustainable urban and ecological infrastructure
Social programs ensuring equality, education, and civic engagement [sites.google.com]
History
The Kongo Supreme Empire was founded on May 23, 2019, by His Eternal Majesty Emperor Baraka Mtajiri, marking the beginning of a new imperial era. In just over six years, Baraka consolidated his authority and guided the empire through what is known as the Barakander Age, a transformative period that strengthened political structures, unified multiple realms—including KSE, BSE, and Shuscop-67—and elevated the empire’s cultural and spiritual identity. [micronatio...fandom.com] [story.com]
Initially, power was shared among the original Supreme 4—King Daudi, Barakaoh Isaya, and Pharaoh Ushindi—alongside Emperor Baraka, forming the first Tetrarchy. Over time, Baraka centralized political, military, and spiritual authority, mirroring Octavian’s rise to Augustus in Rome. This consolidation symbolized the legitimacy and sanctity of his rule, elevating him as the sole supreme ruler while the Tetrarchy continued to function under his overarching command. [micronatio...fandom.com]
Following this consolidation, Emperor Baraka was honored with historic titles:
“Barakander the Great” – Fusing his identity with the classical legacy of conquerors like Alexander the Great (Sikander).
“Imperator Baraka Magnus” – Emphasizing his unparalleled status as supreme ruler, military leader, and cultural unifier. [micronatio...fandom.com]
The Tetrarchy
A defining feature of KSE governance is the Tetrarchy, a system where power is distributed among four supreme leaders. This structure has been central to the empire across all three historical iterations:
First Tetrarchy: Emperor Baraka Mtajiri, King Daudi, Barakaoh Isaya, Pharaoh Ushindi
Second Tetrarchy: Emperor Baraka Mtajiri, King Daudi, Barakaoh Isaya (Supreme High Lord), Baruko Mali Jeremiah (Co-Emperor)
Third and Current Tetrarchy: Emperor Baraka Mtajiri (KSE), Co-Emperor Baruko Mali Jeremiah (BSE), King/Emperor Daudi (Shuscop-67), Supreme High Lord Kyle Yard [micronatio...fandom.com]
Geography and Territorial Claims
KSE claims symbolic sovereignty over multiple territories on Earth and asserts its presence in space under the Terraspaceiation doctrine, which defines it as a nation belonging to both terrestrial and cosmic realms. Its capital, Barakalocus, serves as the administrative and cultural center, supported by provinces and protectorates across allied realms. [sites.google.com]
Demographics and Citizenship
KSE maintains a symbolic population of registered citizens and offers citizenship programs that emphasize loyalty, cultural participation, and civic responsibility. Diversity is celebrated through festivals and educational initiatives, reflecting the empire’s motto: “Where Many Cultures Stand as One Empire.” [sites.google.com]
Economy
The empire operates a digital economy supported by microfinance networks, citizen investment programs, and strategic trade alliances. KSE promotes sustainable development through ecological infrastructure projects and urban planning initiatives. [sites.google.com]
Technology and Innovation
KSE has pioneered cyber governance systems, symbolic space ventures, and research projects aimed at advancing digital sovereignty and intermicronational cooperation. [sites.google.com]
Military and Security
The empire maintains elite security forces and emergency response units to safeguard its sovereignty and enforce imperial law. Military authority is primarily vested in the Co-Emperor and the Supreme Council. [micronatio...fandom.com]
Education and Social Programs
KSE invests in imperial academies, cultural institutions, and social programs that promote equality, education, and civic engagement. [sites.google.com]
Foreign Relations and Alliances
KSE leads global micronational diplomacy through its role as Micronational Supreme Power, recognized by the Micronational Ranking Society (MRS). It oversees the Micronational Research Office (MRO) and the Micronational Alliance and Regulation Authority (MARA), shaping treaties and alliances worldwide. [sites.google.com]
Legal System
KSE enforces imperial law under a divine monarchy framework, guaranteeing rights and freedoms, including freedom of religion, while maintaining the Barahamic religions as the state faith. [sites.google.com]
Culture
Motto: “Where Many Cultures Stand as One Empire.”
Festivals: Unity Through Difference, Emperor’s Day, Flame of Ṛta Festival
Languages: Ṛta-Bhāṣā, Rithava, Lanskirt, Satari [sites.google.com]
Symbols
Flag: Represents unity, heritage, and supreme authority (design pending)
Emblem: Imperial crest featuring Kongo cultural motifs
Anthem: “Rise of the Supreme Empire” (proposed) [micronatio...fandom.com]
Influence in the Micronational Community
KSE claims to be the rule of the entire micronational community, positioning itself as the sole supreme micronational authority. It leads alliances such as the Kongo-Sitrai Unified Alliance (KSUA) and participates in intermicronational unions like IUK and LON. [sites.google.com]
Reception and Criticism
While KSE asserts supremacy, its status remains symbolic. Critics argue that such claims are aspirational and lack enforceability. Supporters view KSE as a cultural and ideological leader within the micronational sphere. [micronatio...fandom.com]
